'''"Kokutan" Thick-Walled Clay Water Tank''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]]. The blueprint is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] on [[Tsurumi Island]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest on a small island south of [[Wakukau Shoal]].
